lblDescription: Insert here your profile. This information is intended only to be used by ArcelorMittal Industeel. This information will not be passed to any third party.
msgErrorFormat: One or more fields do not meet the required format
msgErreurComptePossedeDroitAcces: This Web account already has access to the portal
msgErreurDemandeAccesExistante:
This email address already exists, you can not sign up for a second time.
Please wait until your registration has been validated if this is not the case or contact the helpdesk.
msgErreurMotPasseAccesValidation: The password must contain at least one uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a number and 6 characters in length
msgErreurEmailExistant: Une demande d'accès en cours de validation existe déjà.
